price: Abin da yake a wurinku yanã ƙãrẽwa, kuma abin da yake a wurin Allah ne mai wanzuwã. Kuma lalle ne, Munã sãka wa waɗanda suka yi haƙuri da lãdarsu da mafi kyãwun abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.
arabic: مَا عِندَكُمۡ يَنفَدُ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ بَاقٖۗ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوٓاْ أَجۡرَهُم بِأَحۡسَنِ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā ʿindakum yanfadu wamā ʿinda al-lahi bāqin walanajziyanna alladhīna ṣabarū ajrahum bi-aḥsani mā kānū yaʿmalūna
